resources.string: A product description is the marketing copy that explains what a product is and why it is worth purchasing.The purpose of a product description is to supply customers with important information about the features and benefits of the product so they are compelled to buy.

Dimensions: 153.5 x 71.9 x 8.5 mm (6.04 x 2.83 x 0.33 in) Weight 173.8 g (6.14 oz).
 Build:Glass front (Gorilla Glass 5), glass back (Gorilla Glass 5), plastic frame
 SIM Hybrid Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)
 DISPLAY Type:Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors
 Size:6.09 inches, 91.0 cm2 (~82.5% screen-to-body ratio)
 Resolution:720 x 1560 pixels, 19.5:9 ratio (~282 ppi density)
 Protection:Corning Gorilla Glass 5
